title: How Can I Perform a Forced Upgrade？
answer:
1、Download the upgrade package from http://www.huaweidevice.com/worldwide/technicaIndex.do.
2、Use the unzipping software on your computer to decompress the upgrade package. Do not change the name and structure of the dload folder that is contained in the upgrade package..
3、Use a USB cable to connect your phone to your computer.
4、Copy the dload folder to the root directory of your microSD card.
5、Disable the USB mass storage feature of your phone.
6、Upgrade the software of your phone using the dload folder on your microSD Card.
      a. Power off your phone.
      b. Press the volume up, end, and power keys at the same time. The upgrade screen with a progress bar is displayed.
      c. When the progress bar reaches 100%, remove the battery from your phone for 3 seconds.
      d. Reinstall the battery on your phone, power on the phone, and then wait for the system to start up. When the home screen is displayed, the upgrade is complete.
